Gaara creates a [[sand]] arm beneath his opponent, throwing them up in the air. Then he grabs them with two sand arms, and slams them to the ground.

== Trivia ==
* In ''[[Naruto: Ultimate Ninja Storm]]'', Gaara merely sends three sand waves at his opponent. It was later changed in ''[[Naruto Shippūden: Ultimate Ninja Storm 2]]''.
